short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Surfer allows you to export your personal data from various platforms. All data is saved locally and never shared with anyone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Surfer is a chrome extension that allows you to export your data from different platforms.
